item.description:
A hilarious musical romp through our collective absurdity and crazy-making lifestyles, All Stressed Up! A Musical Comedy, starring Loretta LaRoche, shows us how we are the source of our own insanity and how we all can lighten up, get a grip and enjoy life. This hysterical production features new spins on old musical favorites, dancing, insightful commentary and sketch comedy presented in a variety show format that will be sure to surprise and delight. Get ready to get over yourself and have a ball!

To learn more and purchase your ticket
http://www.thehanover...

Balcony only tickets are still available.

Let's grab a snack and drink after the show at Bocado Tapas Wine Bar on Winter St, Worcester
item.how_to_find_us: Front lobby with a meetup sign
item.name: Loretta LaRoche's All Stressed Up and No Where To Go
